publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4266 Ms Wendy Alexander: Congratulations to St Mirren Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the fantastic achievement of St Mirren Football Club in winning the First Division Championship and, with it, promotion to the Scottish Premier League; pays tribute to Gus MacPherson and his team for a successful season and capturing two trophies, and wishes the team well in the Scottish Premier League next year. Supported by: Colin Fox*, Michael McMahon*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Brian Adam*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Bill Butler*, Jim Mather*, Murray Tosh*, Christine May*, Karen Gillon*, Trish Godman*

S2M-4266 Ms Wendy Alexander: Congratulations to St Mirren Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the fantastic achievement of St Mirren Football Club in winning the First Division Championship and, with it, promotion to the Scottish Premier League; pays tribute to Gus MacPherson and his team for a successful season and capturing two trophies, and wishes the team well in the Scottish Premier League next year. Supported by: Colin Fox, Michael McMahon, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Jackie Baillie, Mr Bruce McFee, Brian Adam, Mr Frank McAveety, Mr Jamie Stone, Dr Elaine Murray, Bill Butler, Jim Mather, Murray Tosh, Christine May, Karen Gillon, Trish Godman, Des McNulty*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Miss Annabel Goldie*
S2M-4266 Congratulations to St Mirren Football Club (lodged on 20 April 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, John Swinburne*
S2M-4266 Congratulations to St Mirren Football Club (lodged on 20 April 2006) Donald Gorrie*
